backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, rewards, logs, reminders, analytics, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with migration applied on upgrade.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user analytics records by removing the lastActiveDay field while preserving existing counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files and components involved in removing per‑user last‑active UI displays.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file providing the Internet Identity URL configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide detailing common deployment issues and fixes for the Hydration Tracker app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions including color tokens, radii, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry registering the service worker and loading the React app root element.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, icons, colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styling and retry button for when the app cannot load.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets, cleaning old caches, and handling network-first fetch with offline fallback.
frontend/PWA.md: Documentation explaining PWA installation, offline behavior, service worker details, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication state, profile setup, and rendering tabs, views, and banners.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Displays admin analytics summary cards for total users and feature event counts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard fetching analytics, handling loading and errors, and rendering summary, user analytics, and debug sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDebug: Shows principal ID, allows copying it, and tests backend identity via whoami for debugging.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserA: Searchable, sortable table listing per-user activity metrics with optional selection callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for login states and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginShareL: Provides share and copy actions for the current URL using Web Share API or clipboard fallback with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting the user to enter a name and submit it to create their profile.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Displays a styled empty state card when no intake history exists.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Shows water intake history with stats, progress, offline notice, and per‑day logs.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Enables quick water‑intake additions, handles offline queuing, reward updates, and goal completion logic.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Displays today's water intake progress, daily goal, streak, and offline status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with branding, user greeting, install button, and login button.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Shows a notice when data is stale due to offline mode, including last-updated timestamp.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Button to trigger PWA installation when available and not already installed.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Displays a banner warning the user when the app detects offline mode.
frontend/src/components/reminders/AdminU: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Shows a fixed in‑app reminder banner with an icon, title, body, and dismiss button based on reminder type.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Provides UI to manage hydration, sleep, streak-break, and custom reminders, including toggles, creation, updates, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Streak: Runs the streak-break reminder hook and renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/rewards/BadgesGr: Displays all badge types with unlock state styling based on earned rewards.
frontend/src/components/rewards/GoalCele: Renders a celebratory card overlay for achieving a daily goal with animated icons and messages.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardsP: Shows user rewards such as streak, completed goals, and badges with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Displays sorted running history with offline indicators, completion status, and formatted run details.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form for logging runs with validation, online/offline handling, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Combines the run logging form and running history list into one view.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Form that loads, edits, and saves user hydration settings with online/offline handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Displays sleep history with averages, offline indicators, sorting, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form to submit sleep hours with validation, online/offline queuing, and success/error toasts.
Combines the sleep log form and history list into a single view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refetches dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handlers, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt events and exposes installability and prompt invocation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, settings, admin checks, hydration/sleep data, and offline-capable mutations.
Provides a hook for managing hydration reminders, including notification permission, interval scheduling, and in‑app fallback reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Implements a context-based reminder scheduler supporting multiple reminder types, notification handling, and shared state for firing and displaying reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBreakReminde: Checks streak-related conditions and triggers a streak‑break reminder near day end, with localStorage settings and daily anti‑spam logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode palettes, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements a per‑principal persistent FIFO queue for offline actions, supporting enqueueing, dequeueing, peeking, and clearing.
frontend/src/offline/offlineStorage.ts: Provides versioned, per‑principal localStorage utilities for reading, writing, and clearing offline‑persisted data.
frontend/src/offline/OfflineSyncProvider: Monitors online status and syncs queued offline actions to the backend, updating caches and showing success or failure toasts.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflinePreferenc: Hook managing a persisted offline-saving preference in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsFormat.ts: Formats bigint counts with suffixes and converts timestamps to relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Normalizes backend errors into readable user-facing messages based on pattern matching.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copying with a fallback and checks for Web Share API support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters for routing and state.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata and feature requests for removing per-user last‑active data.
